title: New: Nieves – Winter
body:
I’m a sucker for the Scottish accent, especially when it comes alongside some of the most beautiful lyrics of the year.

Glaswegian duo **Nieves** follow in the footsteps of the likes of Frightened Rabbit on their debut outing, _Winter_, a gloriously composed number destined to find a place on a TV advert somewhere. If I was 15 again, and wanting to woo my first love, this would be the track I’d send them. Check it out below.

‘you will migrate again I know it / but not to me’
